name: Refract
description:
Challenge your brain with the 50+ nightmare puzzles of "Refract" !

It is about $ 0.99

"Refract" is a puzzle game in which you use the primary colored laser beams and reflect them or refract them to the cuboid of the corresponding color.
Each level has a unique design and every ten levels are themed uniquely. Every level has hints that can help you solve the puzzle.
Also later on, puzzles with rasters and prisms will occur, and so the puzzles become increasingly demanding.

It is a tribute to Chromatron and Lazors.

* Knowledge of English is not needed to be able to play this game.
